summary: This is my CME presets for ECE
descriptionHtml:
Hello,this is my first time posting on nexus~
sorry for my bad english

this is a CME preset used for my character
required mod :
1. Enhanced Character Edit
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?
2. The Eyes of Beauty
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
3. SG Hair Pack (It's not available on nexus,but you can search it in google)
4.Any Body texture,I suggest you to use CBBE/UNP
CBBE : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
UNP : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?

Optimal Files :
1. SG Female Texture Renewal
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?
2. SG Female Eyebrows
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?

Installation
1. Download the file
2. Open The file,extract it to documents/my games/skyrim/CME_Presets
3. Open your skyrim , load your saved game
4. Open Racemenu (recommended to open racemenu with this http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/?)
5. Load this CME Presets
6. Enjoy

Note :
1. This CME preset is based on follower mod Mystic Knight Sara by StandAlone01 ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41381/? )
2. This Preset is for Nord Race
If you have any problem,feel free to comment / PM me~
thanks for using this preset :3

Credit :
CBBE by Caliente
UNP by dimon99
Enhanced Character Edit by ECE Team
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
Mystic Knight Sara - Standalone Follower by StandAlone01
SG Female Textures and SG Hair Pack by HelloSanta
And of course special thanks to :
Bethesda for creating this awesome games
Nexus Community for providing and maintaining such a great place for modders to share their work
author: blade067
